title: What is this typeface? - SinoSolar logo
content:
Does anyone know what the typeface used in this logo is? I know that FF Max and FF Dax are similar in certain ways but it’s neither of them. I would love to know this for a project I’m working on, this typeface looks like it might be perfect.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919173934im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Sino_4672.gif)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Sino.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919173934/http:/typophile.com/files/Sino.gif) | 5.18 KB |

 [‹ interesting neon light, 3 line structure](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919173934/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41989 "Go to previous forum topic") [Topman font? anybody please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919173934/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42018 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jordanlewin

comments.content: Yes, you are so right Angel71! That’s awesome, thank you very much!
